creator: PTI
title: Nirav Modi fraud hit PNB’s capital adequacy fall below regulatory requirement
dc:creator: PTI
content: Fraud-hit Punjab National Bank's capital adequacy has fallen short of the regulatory requirement of Reserve Bank of India due to unprecedented loss in the fourth quarter of 2017-18.
contentSnippet: Fraud-hit Punjab National Bank's capital adequacy has fallen short of the regulatory requirement of Reserve Bank of India due to unprecedented loss in the fourth quarter of 2017-18.
